Posts.Content: The National Cancer Institute has a fact sheet called "Financial Assistance for Cancer Care" and another called "How to Find Resources in Your Own Community If You Have Cancer." You can reach them at telephone number 1-800-422-6237 (they are very nice to talk to), or go to their website at www.cancer.gov. They also have live online assistance at https://cissecure.nci.nih.gov/livehelp/welcome. asp
Posts.Title: Financial Assistance
